colors.theme_strategy: Swiss High-Contrast. Light mode is stark white with black text. Dark mode is deep zinc (not pure black).
colors.gradients: Avoid gradients for backgrounds. Use them only for subtle 'glow' effects on active states or borders.

spacing.scale: Tailwind default but doubled for layout containers. p-8 or p-12 for main sections.
spacing.grid_gap: gap-6 for dashboard, gap-12 for marketing pages.

visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-none (Sharp) or rounded-sm (2px) for a technical financial look.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-xl for floating elements. Avoid heavy drop shadows.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid border-border. Use 'border-r' and 'border-b' patterns for grid layouts.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) on backgrounds to prevent digital flatness.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-6 rounded-sm font-medium transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-6 rounded-sm
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-6 rounded-sm

cards.dashboard: bg-card text-card-foreground border border-border rounded-sm p-6 shadow-sm hover:border-primary/20 transition-colors
cards.stat: bg-background border-r border-b border-border p-6 flex flex-col gap-2

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-sm border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

tables.header: bg-muted/50 text-muted-foreground font-medium text-xs uppercase tracking-wider

dashboard.structure: Sidebar navigation (fixed left) + Main Content Area (scrollable).

auth_page.structure: Left: 50% width, Image/Brand. Right: 50% width, Form centered.
auth_page.mobile: Stack: Image top (hidden or small), Form bottom.

auth_background.usage: Cover image for login/signup page left panel.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Swiss High-Contrast' theme: Strict grids, high contrast text, minimal decoration.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings and 'Public Sans' for body text. Import them in index.css.
For the Dashboard, use a 'Bento Grid' layout. Do not just stack cards vertically.
Use the provided image URLs for the Auth page and User Avatar.
Ensure all financial data (prices, percentages) uses the 'JetBrains Mono' font for alignment.
Color positive values in 'text-emerald-600' and negative in 'text-rose-600'.
Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Keep it flat and clean.
For charts, use Recharts with the custom color palette defined above.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetics (generic centered layouts, blue gradients).
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical. p-8 is the new p-4.
Micro-animations on every interaction (hover, focus, active).
Dark mode must be 'Zinc-950', not pure black.
Glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md with a subtle white/10 border for overlays.
